comments: Awesome guy, cracks jokes at any opportunity, very fun prof! To succeed simply follow his directions for what to complete- reading, tutorials etc. and youre golden! He also makes tutorials ONLINE only so you dont have to cart all your junk to school two days a week- nice guy! Also if u cant make it to class for some reason, lectures are all online!
